i dont get it is jackass 2.5 different the the other 2 or is just a bunch of scences from the other ones

2.5 is "new" scenes.  Pretty much whatever they filmed for Jackass 2 and didn't use, they made into 2.5.  So to answer all your questions that could have been answered simply by googling, Jackass 2.5 is it's own movie, not a collaboration of old scenes from earlier movies or the TV show.
